text: keṭṭa peṇkaḷ keṭṭa āṇkaḷukkum keṭṭa āṇkaḷ keṭṭa peṇkaḷukkum iṉṉum, nalla tūymaiyuṭaiya peṇkaḷ, nalla tūymaiyāṉa āṇkaḷukkum nalla tūymaiyāṉa āṇkaḷ nalla tūymaiyāṉa peṇkaḷuku; kum (takutiyāṉavarkaḷ.) Avarkaḷ kūṟuvatai viṭṭum ivarkaḷē tūymaiyāṉavarkaḷ. Ivarkaḷukku maṉṉippum, kaṇṇiyamāṉa uṇavumuṇṭu
